<NEW>

Wheelie's onl=
y experience with wildlife had been in the artificial nexuses created by th=
e Quintessons, where everything had tried to consume and destroy everything=
 else, where he had been such a short time ago and yet such a long time ago=
.

Glancing up into the sky, as he heard the sound f the Maximals within mo=
bilizing, Wheelie glanced up sadly.  It was not his place to shift the wind=
s of time.

It was not his place to shift the wheels of what would come or =
what might come.  No matter how much eh wished, he could not change what wa=
s to pass.  That was for someone higher, wiser than himself to decide.

Hea=
ring the sound of the Maximals leaving the Ark, Wheelie stayed quiet, and s=
tayed behind.  Watching the group as they readied themselves for whatever, =
he reamined in his place.  War, strife, fighting, was the destiny of the Tr=
asnformers.  And all he could do was play his part.
